rules: Rule1: If the plant extract study receives research funding, then the research project is successful
Rule2: Either the plant extract study receives research funding or the ethics committee approves the plant extract study
Rule3: Either research findings are peer-reviewed or, if the research project is not successful, then a research paper is not published
Rule4: If the funding grant is renewed, then the research project is successful
Rule5: Either the funding grant is renewed or a novel compound is discovered
Rule6: If the research team hires a biochemist, then should a novel compound be discovered, the research project becomes successful
Rule7: Either the research team hires a biochemist or the research team contracts an external laboratory
Rule8: If the research team contracts an external laboratory, then when a novel compound is discovered, the research project is successful
Rule9: If the research period is extended, then either the project timeline is delayed or the research project is successful
Rule10: If the ethics committee approves the plant extract study, then the plant compound is synthesized into an antiviral drug
Rule11: If the extraction method is optimized, then provided that the plant compound is tested on human cells, the clinical trial progresses
Rule12: Either the extraction method is optimized or the cultivation technique is improved
Rule13: If the cultivation technique is improved, then the purification process is enhanced
Rule14: If the bioactive molecule is patented, then the research project is successful
Rule15: If a patent application is filed, then the bioactive molecule is patented
Rule16: If the patent decision is appealed, then the patent claim is not rejected
Rule17: If the clinical trial progresses, then the research project is successful
Rule18: If the plant compound is synthesized into an antiviral drug, then the plant compound is tested on human cells
Rule19: If the plant compound is synthesized into an antiviral drug, then the plant compound is manufactured
Rule20: If the plant compound is manufactured, then the clinical trial progresses
Rule21: If the electron microscope is operational, then the research project is successful
Rule22: If the spectrometry device is functional, then the research project is successful
Rule23: If laboratory equipment is available, then either the electron microscope is operational or the spectrometry device is functional
Rule24: If it is not the case that either experimental data is validated or research findings are not peer-reviewed, then study results are retracted
Rule25: If it is not the case that either experimental data is validated or research findings are not peer-reviewed, then study results are not retracted
Rule26: If it is not true that when a novel compound is discovered then a patent application is filed, then the patent claim is rejected
Rule27: If it is not true that when the purification process is enhanced then the plant compound being tested on human cells leads to clinical trial progression, then quality control fails
Rule28: If the research project is not successful, then a research paper is published
facts: Fact1: The research period is extended
Fact2: The patent decision is appealed
Fact4: Experimental data is not validated
Fact5: The project timeline is not delayed
Fact6: Quality control does not fail
